page.title: 08LEISURE
page.content: The leisure facilities in the Shirley area provide a wide range of choice for all ages ,but the most common activity involving children is watching television(80%).Over 75% also take part in both listening to records and some sporting activity.Other activities include dancing and music,youth clubs and organisations,computers and church activities.The most common activity of adults is sport,followed by drinking and eating out,gardening and watching TV.Within the sample studied,just under half were satisfied with recreational facilities.Of those who were not,most stressed the need for leisure centres,swimming pools and the re-opening of the cinema,closed in 1982.
